ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Five: The First Story
ComicInfo.Series: The Adventures of Augusta Wind: The Last Story
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Story Killer has won! The Storiverse (and all the endless tales it contains) has been erased! Can Augusta Wind and Mr. Snabbit find the fabled, ferocious Tale-Whale and use its power to save us all—or will they, too, dissolve into a universe of Infinite Nothing?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 23:26:53. [CVDB563603]
ComicInfo.Characters: Augusta Wind, Mr. Snabbit, Story Killer
